meta.title: Support Center - AnyTrans
meta.description: Get help with your translation projects and find answers to common questions

header.title: Support Center
header.description: Get help with your translation projects and find answers to common questions

search.placeholder: Search for help articles, FAQs, guides...
search.tryDifferent: Try different keywords or browse categories below

howToUpload.question: How do I upload a document for translation?
howToUpload.answer: Navigate to the Document Translator page, click "Choose File" or drag and drop your document. We support DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, and TXT formats up to 50MB.

supportedLanguages.question: What languages are supported?
supportedLanguages.answer: We support over 100 languages including English, Vietnamese, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, and many more.

translationAccuracy.question: How accurate are the translations?
translationAccuracy.answer: Our AI-powered translation engine provides 95%+ accuracy. For professional translation mode, we achieve 98%+ accuracy with context-aware translation.

creditSystem.question: How does the credit system work?
creditSystem.answer: Each word translated costs 1 credit. Free users get 1,000 credits per month. Pro users get unlimited translations with advanced features.

refundPolicy.question: Can I get a refund?
refundPolicy.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for Pro subscriptions. Contact our support team to process your refund.

accountSettings.question: How do I change my account settings?
accountSettings.answer: Click on your profile in the sidebar, then select "Settings" to manage your account preferences, password, and notifications.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, we use bank-level encryption (AES-256) for all data. Documents are automatically deleted after 24 hours unless you save them.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
fileFormats.answer: We support DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, and SRT (for subtitles). Maximum file size is 50MB per document.

contactForm.title: Still need help?
contactForm.description: Send us a message and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

statusPage.title: Status Page
statusPage.description: Check the current status of our services
